meanings.definition: In a direction parallel to the breadth or width of something.
meanings.sent1: She measured the tablecloth breadthwise to ensure it would fit the table.
meanings.sent2: The painter brushed the wall breadthwise to create an even finish.
meanings.sent3: The cat stretched out breadthwise on the windowsill, taking up the entire space.
meanings.sent4: His smile spread breadthwise across his face, showing his joy.
meanings.sent5: The river flowed breadthwise, reflecting the sunlight in a shimmering dance.

meanings.definition: From one side to the other side in a horizontal direction.

meanings.sent2: The flag was unfurled breadthwise, displaying its colors in full.
meanings.sent3: The pizza was cut breadthwise, causing an uproar among the party guests.
